pages.text: I got an epiphany on how to create potions after I created a questionable potion. The first of the ideas is to create a healing potion. To do this, you need: a crystal violet, a bottle of honey, a sunflower and a chamomile
The second idea is how to create an oak leather potion that protects against damage. To create it, you need: crystal violet, acorn, obsidian and leather.
The third idea is to create a potion of cat vision, because in the dark monsters are not visible! The following ingredients are needed: crystal violet, star moss, pure fruit, light dust.

The fourth thought, since at any moment someone may appear in the cave, you need to create a hurry potion to dig faster. The recipe is as follows: crystal violet, silver sage, golden pickaxe and golden carrot. An entropy potion is placed as a reagent (orange cell).
